sentences.english: Daye city or village women's federation of women's demonstration focused on building the village.
sentences.chinese: 该村还是大冶市妇联重点建设的巾帼示范村。

sentences.english: Capable men produce the capable woman ideal.
sentences.chinese: 能干的男人造就能干的巾帼楷模。

sentences.english: She is a regular boxer in petticoats.
sentences.chinese: 她是个十足的巾帼拳击家。

sentences.english: She blushed when they called her a heroine.
sentences.chinese: 当他们叫她为巾帼英雄时她脸红了。

sentences.english: Governor Zhou talked with clients at "Able Women Post" in Wealth Management Center.

sentences.english: Girls show fight too, grabbing the biggest bag.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘们也巾帼不让须眉，抢着拿起了最大的袋子。

sentences.english: Whether you are a warm-blooded son, or a teenage girl who love table tennis.
sentences.chinese: 不论你是热血男儿，还是巾帼不让须眉的乒坛少女。

sentences.english: She was an outstanding female hero in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 是中国历史上杰出的巾帼英雄。

sentences.english: These are the heroines in the field of spaceflight.
sentences.chinese: 就这是航天领域的巾帼英雄。

sentences.english: Two lovers become spouses eventually, home Yang from this much brave of a women will.
sentences.chinese: 两位有情人终成眷属，杨家自此又多了一位巾帼勇将。

definition: (idiom) to compare favorably with men in terms of ability, bravery etc/to be a match for men/lit. not conceding to men (beard and eyebrows)
woman of distinction/a woman to be admired or respected
assemblage of talented individuals/ensemble of heroes
